1.1 åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯

import org.apache.curator.RetryPolicy;
import org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework;
import org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFrameworkFactory;
import org.apache.curator.framework.api.BackgroundCallback;
import org.apache.curator.framework.api.CuratorEvent;
import org.apache.curator.retry.ExponentialBackoffRetry;
import org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode;
import org.apache.zookeeper.data.Stat;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;
import org.junit.Test;

import java.util.List;

public class CuratorTest {


    private CuratorFramework client;

    /**
     * å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥
     */
    @Before
    public void testConnect() {

        /*
         *
         * @param connectString       è¿æ¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚zk server åœ°å€å’Œç«¯å£ "192.168.149.135:2181,192.168.149.136:2181"
         * @param sessionTimeoutMs    ä¼šè¯è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´ å•ä½ms
         * @param connectionTimeoutMs è¿æ¥è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´ å•ä½ms
         * @param retryPolicy         é‡è¯•ç­–ç•¥
         */
       /* //é‡è¯•ç­–ç•¥
        RetryPolicy retryPolicy = new ExponentialBackoffRetry(3000,10);
        //1.ç¬¬ä¸€ç§æ–¹å¼
        CuratorFramework client = CuratorFrameworkFactory.newClient("192.168.149.135:2181",
                60 * 1000, 15 * 1000, retryPolicy);*/
        //é‡è¯•ç­–ç•¥
        RetryPolicy retryPolicy = new ExponentialBackoffRetry(3000, 10);
        //2.ç¬¬äºŒç§æ–¹å¼
        //CuratorFrameworkFactory.builder();
        client = CuratorFrameworkFactory.builder()
                .connectString("ipåœ°å€:2181")   //æ­¤å¤„ä¸€å®šè¦ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºå…·ä½“çš„zookeeperæ‰€åœ¨çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨ip
                .sessionTimeoutMs(60 * 1000)
                .connectionTimeoutMs(15 * 1000)
                .retryPolicy(retryPolicy)
                .namespace("mydemo")
                .build();

        //å¼€å¯è¿æ¥
        client.start();

    }
//==============================create=============================================================================

    /**
     * åˆ›å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼šcreate æŒä¹… ä¸´æ—¶ é¡ºåº æ•°æ®
     * 1. åŸºæœ¬åˆ›å»º ï¼šcreate().forPath("")
     * 2. åˆ›å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ å¸¦æœ‰æ•°æ®:create().forPath("",data)
     * 3. è®¾ç½®èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç±»å‹ï¼šcreate().withMode().forPath("",data)
     * 4. åˆ›å»ºå¤šçº§èŠ‚ç‚¹  /app1/p1 ï¼šcreate().creatingParentsIfNeeded().forPath("",data)
     */
    @Test
    public void testCreate() throws Exception {
        //2. åˆ›å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ å¸¦æœ‰æ•°æ®
        //å¦‚æœåˆ›å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®šæ•°æ®ï¼Œåˆ™é»˜è®¤å°†å½“å‰å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„ipä½œä¸ºæ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨
        String path = client.create().forPath("/app2", "hehe".getBytes());
        System.out.println(path);

    }

    @Test
    public void testCreate2() throws Exception {
        //1. åŸºæœ¬åˆ›å»º
        //å¦‚æœåˆ›å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®šæ•°æ®ï¼Œåˆ™é»˜è®¤å°†å½“å‰å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„ipä½œä¸ºæ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨
        String path = client.create().forPath("/app1");
        System.out.println(path);

    }

    @Test
    public void testCreate3() throws Exception {
        //3. è®¾ç½®èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç±»å‹
        //é»˜è®¤ç±»å‹ï¼šæŒä¹…åŒ–
        String path = client.create().withMode(CreateMode.EPHEMERAL).forPath("/app3");
        System.out.println(path);


    }

    @Test
    public void testCreate4() throws Exception {
        //4. åˆ›å»ºå¤šçº§èŠ‚ç‚¹  /app1/p1
        //creatingParentsIfNeeded():å¦‚æœçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ›å»ºçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹
        String path = client.create().creatingParentsIfNeeded().forPath("/app4/p1");
        System.out.println(path);
    }
//===========================get================================================================================

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š
     * 1. æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®ï¼šget: getData().forPath()
     * 2. æŸ¥è¯¢å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š ls: getChildren().forPath()
     * 3. æŸ¥è¯¢èŠ‚ç‚¹çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šls -s:getData().storingStatIn(çŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡).forPath()
     */

    @Test
    public void testGet1() throws Exception {
        //1. æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®ï¼šget
        byte[] data = client.getData().forPath("/app1");
        System.out.println(new String(data));
    }

    @Test
    public void testGet2() throws Exception {
        // 2. æŸ¥è¯¢å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š ls
        List<String> path = client.getChildren().forPath("/");

        System.out.println(path);
    }

    @Test
    public void testGet3() throws Exception {


        Stat status = new Stat();
        System.out.println(status);
        //3. æŸ¥è¯¢èŠ‚ç‚¹çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šls -s
        client.getData().storingStatIn(status).forPath("/app1");

        System.out.println(status);

    }

    //===========================set================================================================================

    /**
     * ä¿®æ”¹æ•°æ®
     * 1. åŸºæœ¬ä¿®æ”¹æ•°æ®ï¼šsetData().forPath()
     * 2. æ ¹æ®ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¿®æ”¹: setData().withVersion().forPath()
     * * version æ˜¯é€šè¿‡æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥çš„ã€‚ç›®çš„å°±æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è®©å…¶ä»–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æˆ–è€…çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å¹²æ‰°æˆ‘ã€‚
     *
     * @throws Exception
     */
    @Test
    public void testSet() throws Exception {
        client.setData().forPath("/app1", "itcast".getBytes());
    }


    @Test
    public void testSetForVersion() throws Exception {

        Stat status = new Stat();
        //3. æŸ¥è¯¢èŠ‚ç‚¹çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šls -s
        client.getData().storingStatIn(status).forPath("/app1");


        int version = status.getVersion();//æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥çš„ 3
        System.out.println(version);
        client.setData().withVersion(version).forPath("/app1", "hehe".getBytes());
    }

    //===========================delete================================================================================

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š delete deleteall
     * 1. åˆ é™¤å•ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹:delete().forPath("/app1");
     * 2. åˆ é™¤å¸¦æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹:delete().deletingChildrenIfNeeded().forPath("/app1");
     * 3. å¿…é¡»æˆåŠŸçš„åˆ é™¤:ä¸ºäº†é˜²æ­¢ç½‘ç»œæŠ–åŠ¨ã€‚æœ¬è´¨å°±æ˜¯é‡è¯•ã€‚  client.delete().guaranteed().forPath("/app2");
     * 4. å›è°ƒï¼šinBackground
     * @throws Exception
     */


    @Test
    public void testDelete() throws Exception {
        // 1. åˆ é™¤å•ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
        client.delete().forPath("/app1");
    }

    @Test
    public void testDelete2() throws Exception {
        //2. åˆ é™¤å¸¦æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
        client.delete().deletingChildrenIfNeeded().forPath("/app4");
    }
    @Test
    public void testDelete3() throws Exception {
        //3. å¿…é¡»æˆåŠŸçš„åˆ é™¤
        client.delete().guaranteed().forPath("/app2");
    }

    @Test
    public void testDelete4() throws Exception {
        //4. å›è°ƒ
        client.delete().guaranteed().inBackground(new BackgroundCallback(){

            @Override
            public void processResult(CuratorFramework client, CuratorEvent event) throws Exception {
                System.out.println("æˆ‘è¢«åˆ é™¤äº†~");
                System.out.println(event);
            }
        }).forPath("/app1");
    }

    @After
    public void close() {
        if (client != null) {
            client.close();
        }
    }


}

package com.itheima.curator;

import org.apache.curator.RetryPolicy;
import org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework;
import org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFrameworkFactory;
import org.apache.curator.framework.api.BackgroundCallback;
import org.apache.curator.framework.api.CuratorEvent;
import org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.*;
import org.apache.curator.retry.ExponentialBackoffRetry;
import org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode;
import org.apache.zookeeper.data.Stat;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;
import org.junit.Test;

import java.util.List;

public class CuratorWatcherTest {


    private CuratorFramework client;

    /**
     * å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥
     */
    @Before
    public void testConnect() {

        /*
         *
         * @param connectString       è¿æ¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚zk server åœ°å€å’Œç«¯å£ "192.168.149.135:2181,192.168.149.136:2181"
         * @param sessionTimeoutMs    ä¼šè¯è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´ å•ä½ms
         * @param connectionTimeoutMs è¿æ¥è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´ å•ä½ms
         * @param retryPolicy         é‡è¯•ç­–ç•¥
         */
       /* //é‡è¯•ç­–ç•¥
        RetryPolicy retryPolicy = new ExponentialBackoffRetry(3000,10);
        //1.ç¬¬ä¸€ç§æ–¹å¼
        CuratorFramework client = CuratorFrameworkFactory.newClient("192.168.149.135:2181",
                60 * 1000, 15 * 1000, retryPolicy);*/
        //é‡è¯•ç­–ç•¥
        RetryPolicy retryPolicy = new ExponentialBackoffRetry(3000, 10);
        //2.ç¬¬äºŒç§æ–¹å¼
        //CuratorFrameworkFactory.builder();
        client = CuratorFrameworkFactory.builder()
                .connectString("ipåœ°å€:2181")  //æ­¤å¤„ipåœ°å€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºzkæ‰€åœ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ip
                .sessionTimeoutMs(60 * 1000)
                .connectionTimeoutMs(15 * 1000)
                .retryPolicy(retryPolicy)    //åœ¨è¿™ç§ç­–ç•¥ä¸‹ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•itheimaè¿™ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸‹æ²¡æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹äº†ï¼Œè¿‡ä¸€ä¼šå°±ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨æŠŠitheimaè¿™ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤äº†
                .namespace("itheima")
                .build();

        //å¼€å¯è¿æ¥
        client.start();

    }

    @After
    public void close() {
        if (client != null) {
            client.close();
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ¼”ç¤º NodeCacheï¼šç»™æŒ‡å®šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬å™¨
     */

    @Test
    public void testNodeCache() throws Exception {
        //1. åˆ›å»ºNodeCacheå¯¹è±¡
        final NodeCache nodeCache = new NodeCache(client,"/app1");
        //2. æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬
        nodeCache.getListenable().addListener(new NodeCacheListener() {
            @Override
            public void nodeChanged() throws Exception {
                System.out.println("èŠ‚ç‚¹å˜åŒ–äº†~");

                //è·å–ä¿®æ”¹èŠ‚ç‚¹åçš„æ•°æ®
                byte[] data = nodeCache.getCurrentData().getData();
                System.out.println(new String(data));
            }
        });

        //3. å¼€å¯ç›‘å¬.å¦‚æœè®¾ç½®ä¸ºtrueï¼Œåˆ™å¼€å¯ç›‘å¬æ˜¯ï¼ŒåŠ è½½ç¼“å†²æ•°æ®
        nodeCache.start(true);


        while (true){

        }
    }



    /**
     * æ¼”ç¤º PathChildrenCacheï¼šç›‘å¬æŸä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä»¬
     */

    @Test
    public void testPathChildrenCache() throws Exception {
        //1.åˆ›å»ºç›‘å¬å¯¹è±¡
        PathChildrenCache pathChildrenCache = new PathChildrenCache(client,"/app2",true);

        //2. ç»‘å®šç›‘å¬å™¨
        pathChildrenCache.getListenable().addListener(new PathChildrenCacheListener() {
            @Override
            public void childEvent(CuratorFramework client, PathChildrenCacheEvent event) throws Exception {
                System.out.println("å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å˜åŒ–äº†~");
                System.out.println(event);
                //ç›‘å¬å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ•°æ®å˜æ›´ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ‹¿åˆ°å˜æ›´åçš„æ•°æ®
                //1.è·å–ç±»å‹
                PathChildrenCacheEvent.Type type = event.getType();
                //2.åˆ¤æ–­ç±»å‹æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯update
                if(type.equals(PathChildrenCacheEvent.Type.CHILD_UPDATED)){
                    System.out.println("æ•°æ®å˜äº†ï¼ï¼ï¼");
                    byte[] data = event.getData().getData();
                    System.out.println(new String(data));

                }
            }
        });
        //3. å¼€å¯
        pathChildrenCache.start();

        while (true){

        }
    }





    /**
     * æ¼”ç¤º TreeCacheï¼šç›‘å¬æŸä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªå·±å’Œæ‰€æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä»¬
     */

    @Test
    public void testTreeCache() throws Exception {
        //1. åˆ›å»ºç›‘å¬å™¨
        TreeCache treeCache = new TreeCache(client,"/app2");

        //2. æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬
        treeCache.getListenable().addListener(new TreeCacheListener() {
            @Override
            public void childEvent(CuratorFramework client, TreeCacheEvent event) throws Exception {
                System.out.println("èŠ‚ç‚¹å˜åŒ–äº†");
                System.out.println(event);
            }
        });

        //3. å¼€å¯
        treeCache.start();

        while (true){

        }
    }

}
